type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute positioned ~0.5 ~0.75 ~0.5 run kill @e[tag=THT-tree_countdown,distance=..1]</field></block></value><value @e[name=THT-random_tree,limit=1,sort=nearest] ForgeData set from block ~ ~ ~ ForgeData</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block
